# Notice: Request for Proposal
## Solicitation Number: BPM020879/25651
### Published: February 15, 2024
#### Closing Date: February 29, 2024

The Government of Canada has issued a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the procurement of **ADP Software**. This solicitation is open to all qualified vendors.

### Contract Details
- **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada  
- **End-User Entity:** Shared Services Canada  
- **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada  

### Solicitation Summary
- **Title:** SSC Req. 2023-06-29  
- **Description:** The purpose of this solicitation is to acquire ADP software that meets the Government's requirements.

### Supplier Eligibility
- **Eligible Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is open to suppliers who are eligible under the following trade agreements: 
    - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) 
    - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) 
    - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
    - Atlantic Procurement Agreement 
    - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement 
    - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement 
    - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) 
    - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) 
    - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) 
    - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Requirements
The tender must be submitted electronically through the Shared Services Canada portal. The following attachments are available for download:

* [Full Tender Package](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B718E0E9-C2F5-43AF-9015-EBA782BEAE31)
